content.title: Financial Assistance of Hearing Machine/Hearing Aid to Workers and their Dependents- Haryana Labour Welfare Board
content.details: This scheme provides financial assistance for hearing machines/hearing aids to workers and their dependents under the Haryana Labour Welfare Board.
benefits: Financial assistance for purchasing hearing machines/hearing aids
Support for workers and their dependents
eligibility: Must be a registered worker under the Haryana Labour Welfare Board
Dependents of registered workers are also eligible
content.application_process: Online application through the Labour Department Haryana website or Antyodaya-SARAL Portal.
